title: Forehand grip basics
summary: A relaxed, neutral grip keeps shots accurate and reduces strain.

sections.title: Key points
items: V-shape formed by thumb and index points to the side bevel.
Hold the handle like a handshake, not a squeeze.
Contact the shuttle slightly in front of the body.

sections.title: Steps
items: Place the thumb lightly on the side of the handle.
Relax the last three fingers until the swing starts.
Squeeze briefly at impact, then relax again.

sections.title: Common mistakes
items: Thumb on top of the handle.
Constant tight grip throughout the swing.
Contact too late near the body.

drills.name: Grip check shadow
notes: Pause to check the V-shape every 5 reps.
